data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 2, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Eduardo Vargas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tigres.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 3, Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Iturbe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 6, Tigres have a goal kick.
Throw-in Tigres.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 7, Jorge Perez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Tigres's half.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 10, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 12, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres just outside Pumas UNAM's area.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 15, Amaury Garcia Moreno (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, In Nuevo Leon Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac is caught offside.
Tigres's Javier Aquino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pumas UNAM defender.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 21, Pumas UNAM drives forward and Jero Rodriguez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 24, In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jorge Perez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Tigres's half.
In the minute 29, Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 35, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 43, Jorge Perez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Tigres push forward at Estadio Universitario (UANL) and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pumas UNAM defence.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 45, Jorge Perez signals a Tigres throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
The second-half is now underway.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 46, Tigres to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 46, Julian Quinones is replacing Jordan Sierra for the home team.
Facundo Waller is on a sub for Amaury Garcia Moreno for Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Eduardo Vargas for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Tigres have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 55, Free kick Tigres.
In Nuevo Leon Tigres attack through Julian Quinones. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Andre Pierre Gignac of Tigres is pulled up for offside.
Pumas UNAM have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Jero Rodriguez of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Tigres in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Jorge Perez signals a Tigres throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
In the minute 61, The home team replace Luis Quinones with Raymundo Fulgencio.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Julian Quinones (Tigres) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, Tigres needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Juan Dinenno (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Jorge Perez.
In the minute 65, Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for Pumas UNAM, close to Tigres's area.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Carlos Gutierrez is booked for the away team.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 70, Tigres to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team have replaced Eduardo Vargas with Leonardo Fernandez. This is the third substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
In the minute 73, Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tigres's half?
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, Tigres's Leonardo Fernandez is whistled for offside at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Andre Pierre Gignac is on target to give Tigres a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 77, Francisco Meza instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In the minute 79, Jorge Perez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Tigres's half.
Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a second substitution, with Carlos Gonzalez replacing Carlos Gutierrez.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
An attacking Pumas UNAM player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 84, A massive blow for Pumas UNAM as Juan Dinenno misses from the spot.
Jorge Perez awards Tigres a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 85, Tigres have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Tigres.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 87, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Tigres's Julian Quinones is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 88, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Tigres.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Tigres.
Jorge Perez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Jorge Perez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Carlos Gonzalez equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Great play from Erik Lira to set up the goal.
Johan Vasquez (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
